root_required_install_msg: Installation requires root privileges for system-wide install or custom path access. Please enter your password.
root_required_uninstall_msg: Uninstallation requires root privileges to remove system-wide files/links. Please enter your password.
sudo_failed_msg: Failed to execute commands with root privileges. Check logs.
Could not load the list of installed app: Could not load the list of installed applications. Check logs for details.
This application is missing its files an: This application is missing its files and cannot be run.
Could not find the executable for '{app_: Could not find the executable for '{app_name}'.
Are you sure you want to uninstall '{app: Are you sure you want to uninstall '{app_name}'?
The files for '{app_name}' seem to be mi: The files for '{app_name}' seem to be missing. Remove the database entry anyway?
The files for '{app_name}' seem to be missing and it has no ID. Remove the corrupt database entry?
The database entry for '{app_name}' is i: The database entry for '{app_name}' is inconsistent (missing ID). Cannot proceed with uninstall.
Failed to save the database after removi: Failed to save the database after removing the entry.
Failed to save database after removing c: Failed to save database after removing corrupt entry for '{app_name}'.
Could not find the database entry to rem: Could not find the database entry to remove.
Failed to remove application files/links: Failed to remove application files/links (requires root). Check logs.
An error occurred while trying to run co: An error occurred while trying to run commands with root privileges.
Could not remove some files/links. Pleas: Could not remove some files/links. Please check logs or filesystem manually.
Removed application files, but failed to: Removed application files, but failed to update the database. Please refresh.
An unexpected error occurred during unin: An unexpected error occurred during uninstall: {error}
The following files/directories might be: The following files/directories might be leftovers from the uninstalled application. Please review carefully and select the ones you want to remove:
Failed to remove some or all selected le: Failed to remove some or all selected leftover items. Check logs.
An error occurred while checking for lef: An error occurred while checking for leftover files.
'{app_name}' has been successfully unins: '{app_name}' has been successfully uninstalled (leftover check failed).
The following directories appear to be A: The following directories appear to be AppImage Manager installations but are not tracked in the database. They might be old remnants or from a cleared database. Marked items (.aim_managed file found) are almost certainly leftovers. Unmarked items are likely remnants but require more caution. Select the ones you want to permanently remove:
Failed to remove {count} leftover instal: Failed to remove {count} leftover installation(s). Check logs for details.
An error occurred while scanning for lef: An error occurred while scanning for leftovers. Check logs.
custom_path_label: Custom Base Path (if Mode is Custom):
error_invalid_appimage: Error: Invalid AppImage file or metadata.
select_file_first: Please select an AppImage file first.
